Key Match Events: Shane Greene scored on a single by Keith in the 8th inning.
Justyn-Henry Malloy hit a sacrifice fly to center, scoring Vierling and tying the game in the 8th inning.
Keith singled to center, scoring Greene and Vierling to third in the 8th inning.
Carpenter singled to right, scoring Keith in the 6th inning.
Keith tripled to right, scoring Vierling in the 6th inning.
Walls scored on a wild pitch by Mize in the 5th inning.
B. Lowe singled to right, Rortvedt scored and Walls scored in the 3rd inning.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Comerica Park in Detroit, Michigan, with an attendance of 27,867.
The Detroit Tigers moved closer to the postseason with a 4-3 win over the Tampa Bay Rays.
The Rays lost their third consecutive game to the Tigers, with a final score of 4-3.
The Tigers rallied from a 3-0 deficit in the 8th inning to win the game.
The game lasted 2 hours and 23 minutes.
The Tigers improved their record to 85-74, while the Rays fell to 78-81.
